name: Deflector Shield
desc: Shield will not overload but have a regenrate time %s/%s/%s/%s more than overload time, depending on hull size and allows the ship except fighter to dissipate hard flux at %s of the normal rate while shields are on.
short: Shield will not overload but need to regenerate instead and allows dissipation of hard flux while shields are up.

name: Redundant Shield Generators
desc: Reduces the amount of damage taken by shields by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size and increases flux capacity by %s.
short: Reduces damage taken by shields and increases flux capacity.
sModDesc: The additional built-in shield generators increase the overload time by %s.

name: R-series Astromech Droids
desc: Increases engine and weapon repair speed by %s percent and decreases the amount of time the ship remains disabled by %s percent. Increases combat CR recovery and repair rate by %s percent.
short: Reduced overload time and increased repair speed

name: Beskar Armor Plating
desc: Increases the ship's armor by %s/%s/%s/%s points, depending on hull size. Also reduces armor damage taken by %s.
short: Increases the ship's armor points and reduces armor damage taken.
sModDesc: Additional armor reduces ship maneuverability by %s

name: Class 1 Hyperdrive
desc: Reduces  fuel use by %s and increases maximum burn level by %s.
short: Reduces fuel costs and increase max burn level.

name: Tibanna Gas Coolant
desc: Reduces weapons flux generation by %s and increases the ship's flux dissipation by %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.
short: Reduces energy weapons flux generation and increases flux dissipation.

name: Kyber Crystal Focus
desc: Increases damage dealt by energy weapons by %s and range of energy weapons by %s.
short: Increases the damge and range of energy weapons.

name: Advanced Targeting Computer
desc: All point defense weapons get the best possible target leading, damage to missiles and fighters is increased by %s.
short: Improves the accuracy of point defense weapons, increases damage to missiles and fighters.

name: Battle Droid Ship Crews
desc: Replaces ship crews with B1 Battle Droids, reduce ship crews requirement by %s. However, critial malfunction chance when low CR increases by %s.
short: Replaces ship crews with B1 Battle Droids. Risks of increase of critial malfunction chance when CR is low.
sModDesc: Reduce ship crews requirement up to %s. Lower the critial malfunction chance when low CR to %s.

name: Jedi Commander
desc: Battle meditation used by the Jedi commander reduces CR use per second by %s percent and reduces critial malfunction chance by %s percent.
short: Battle meditation used by the Jedi commander improves the CR peformance of the ship.

name: Escape Pod
desc: Escape pods reduce crew loss due to hull damage by %s percent.
short: Escape pods reduce crew loss when the ship is destroyed.
sModDesc: Further reduce crew loss due to hull damage by %s percent.

name: Capture Shuttle
desc: Sends out %s/%s/%s/%s capture shuttle(s), depending on hull size. Each has %s chance to make enemy ship to be able to salvage after combat.
short: Capture shuttle makes enemy ship capturable.

name: Base Delta Zero
desc: Base Delta Zero was the naval code to order the surface destruction of a planetary target by orbital bombardment. Increases the effective strength of planetary raids by %s/%s/%s, depending on hull size, up to the total number of marines in the fleet. Reduces the fuel cost of orbital bombardment by %s.
short: Improves effectiveness of raids and reduces cost of bombardment.

name: Dovin Basal
desc: Dovin basals were a form of organic defense tools used by the Yuuzhan Vong. Spherical plants of varying size, dovin basals were able to generate powerful gravitational fields that were used mainly as propulsion devices and shields. They were capable of creating micro-black holes that could absorb laser shots at spacecraft, as well as almost anything else, from proton torpedoes to concussion missiles. However, attacking in multiple angles could overwhalm the dovin basals for %s seconds. Continues to build stress on dovin basal would also reduce the propulsion power of the ship up to a maximum of %s/%s/%s/%s, depends on hullsize.
short: Invulnerable shield unless gets attacked in multiple directions. The ship speed reduces when flux increases.

name: Internal Dockyards
desc: The Mega-class Star Dreadnought was large enough to dock eight Resurgent-class Star Destroyers: six externally and two internally. It will deploy two from the internal dockyards to aid for battle.
short: Deploy two Resurgent-class Star Destroyers to aid for battle.

name: TIE/fc Sensors
desc: The TIE/fc Sensors were primarily designed to scan an enemy base and transmit precise targeting information back to the fleet. Increase sensor range in combat by %s and autofire accuracy of friend units within 2000 range by %s.
short: Increases sensor range in combat and increases autofire accuracy of friendly units.

name: Imperial Turbolaser Power Generator
desc: The imperial power generator provides turbolaser batteries with extra energy, increases energy weapon damage by %s.
short: Increases energy weapon damage.

name: Mon Calamari Shield Generator
desc: The ship is outfitted with Mon Calamari shield generator, reduces shield upkeep and overload time by %s and %s respectively.
short: Reduces shield damage taken and recharge time.

name: Republic Starfighter Operation Centre
desc: Galactic Republic ships consists of an independent starfighter operation centre, increases sensor strength by %s and fighter operational range by %s.
short: Increase sensor strength and fighter wing operational range.

name: CIS Droid
desc: The CIS battle droid supplement crews do not need food and rest, reduces monthly supply cost by %s and increase peak CR duration by %s seconds.
short: Reduces CR decrease rate.

name: Mandalorian Armor Works
desc: The Mandalorian implement their excel armor smithing technic into ship armor building, increases ship armor by %s/%s/%s/%s points depending on hull sizes.
short: Increases ship armor.

name: Zann Consortium Stealth Field
desc: The Zann Consortium implement stealth technology on their ship to aid infiltration, decreases ship sensor profile by %s.
short: Reduces ship sensor profile.

name: Black Sun Smuggler Sublight Drive
desc: The ship is outfitted with advanced sublight drive used by Black Sun Smuggler, increases top speed by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on hull sizes.
short: Increases top speed.

name: First Order Reinforced Superstructure
desc: The First Order builds their ships with reinforced superstructure, increases hull points by %s.
short: Increases hull points.

name: Chiss Electrostatic Barrier
desc: The ship is outfitted with the Chiss electrostatic barrier, reduces EMP damage taken by %s.
short: Reduces EMP damage taken.

name: #Hanger System
desc: Increases sensor range in combat and increases autofire accuracy of friendly units.
short: Increases sensor range in combat and increases autofire accuracy of friendly units.
